name: @vue-bits
description: An open source collection of animated, interactive & fully customizable Vue components for building stunning, memorable user interfaces.

items.name: AnimatedContent
items.title: AnimatedContent
items.description: Wrapper that animates any children on scroll or mount with configurable direction, distance, duration and easing.

items.name: BlobCursor
items.title: BlobCursor
items.description: Organic blob cursor that smoothly follows the pointer with inertia and elastic morphing.

items.name: ClickSpark
items.title: ClickSpark
items.description: Creates particle spark bursts at click position.

items.name: Crosshair
items.title: Crosshair
items.description: Custom crosshair cursor with tracking, and link hover effects.

items.name: Cubes
items.title: Cubes
items.description: 3D rotating cube cluster. Supports auto-rotation or hover interaction.

items.name: ElectricBorder
items.title: ElectricBorder
items.description: Jittery electric energy border with animated arcs, glow and adjustable intensity.

items.name: FadeContent
items.title: FadeContent
items.description: Simple directional fade / slide entrance wrapper with threshold-based activation.

items.name: GlareHover
items.title: GlareHover
items.description: Adds a realistic moving glare highlight on hover over any element.

items.name: GradualBlur
items.title: GradualBlur
items.description: Progressively un-blurs content based on scroll or trigger creating a cinematic reveal.

items.name: GhostCursor
items.title: GhostCursor
items.description: Semi-transparent ghost cursor that smoothly follows the real cursor with a trailing effect.

items.name: ImageTrail
items.title: ImageTrail
items.description: Cursor-based image trail with several built-in variants.

items.name: LogoLoop
items.title: LogoLoop
items.description: Continuously looping marquee of brand or tech logos with seamless repeat and hover pause.

items.name: Magnet
items.title: Magnet
items.description: Elements magnetically ease toward the cursor then settle back with spring physics.

items.name: MagnetLines
items.title: MagnetLines
items.description: Animated field lines bend toward the cursor.

items.name: MetaBalls
items.title: MetaBalls
items.description: Liquid metaball blobs that merge and separate with smooth implicit surface animation.

items.name: MetallicPaint
items.title: MetallicPaint
items.description: Liquid metallic paint shader which can be applied to SVG elements.

items.name: Noise
items.title: Noise
items.description: Animated film grain / noise overlay adding subtle texture and motion.

items.name: PixelTransition
items.title: PixelTransition
items.description: Pixel dissolve transition for content reveal on hover.

items.name: Ribbons
items.title: Ribbons
items.description: Flowing responsive ribbons/cursor trail driven by physics and pointer motion.

items.name: ShapeBlur
items.title: ShapeBlur
items.description: Morphing blurred geometric shape. The effect occurs on hover.

items.name: SplashCursor
items.title: SplashCursor
items.description: Liquid splash burst at cursor with curling ripples and waves.

items.name: StarBorder
items.title: StarBorder
items.description: Animated star / sparkle border orbiting content with twinkle pulses.

items.name: StickerPeel
items.title: StickerPeel
items.description: Sticker corner lift + peel interaction using 3D transform and shadow depth.

items.name: TargetCursor
items.title: TargetCursor
items.description: A cursor follow animation with 4 corners that lock onto targets.

items.name: LaserFlow
items.title: LaserFlow
items.description: Dynamic laser light that flows onto a surface, customizable effect.

items.name: CountUp
items.title: CountUp
items.description: Animated number counter supporting formatting and decimals.

items.name: ASCIIText
items.title: ASCIIText
items.description: Renders text with an animated ASCII background for a retro feel.

items.name: BlurText
items.title: BlurText
items.description: Text starts blurred then crisply resolves for a soft-focus reveal effect.

items.name: CircularText
items.title: CircularText
items.description: Layouts characters around a circle with optional rotation animation.

items.name: CurvedLoop
items.title: CurvedLoop
items.description: Flowing looping text path along a customizable curve with drag interaction.

items.name: DecryptedText
items.title: DecryptedText
items.description: Hacker-style decryption cycling random glyphs until resolving to real text.

items.name: FallingText
items.title: FallingText
items.description: Characters fall with gravity + bounce creating a playful entrance.

items.name: FuzzyText
items.title: FuzzyText
items.description: Vibrating fuzzy text with controllable hover intensity.

items.name: GlitchText
items.title: GlitchText
items.description: RGB split and distortion glitch effect with jitter effects.

items.name: GradientText
items.title: GradientText
items.description: Animated gradient sweep across live text with speed and color control.

items.name: RotatingText
items.title: RotatingText
items.description: Cycles through multiple phrases with 3D rotate / flip transitions.

items.name: ScrambleText
items.title: ScrambleText
items.description: Detects cursor position and applies a distortion effect to text.

items.name: ScrollFloat
items.title: ScrollFloat
items.description: Text gently floats / parallax shifts on scroll.

items.name: ScrollReveal
items.title: ScrollReveal
items.description: Text gently unblurs and reveals on scroll.

items.name: ScrollVelocity
items.title: ScrollVelocity
items.description: Text marquee animatio - speed and distortion scale with user's scroll velocity.

items.name: ShinyText
items.title: ShinyText
items.description: Metallic sheen sweeps across text producing a reflective highlight.

items.name: SplitText
items.title: SplitText
items.description: Splits text into characters / words for staggered entrance animation.

items.name: TextCursor
items.title: TextCursor
items.description: Make any text element follow your cursor, leaving a trail of copies behind it.

items.name: TextPressure
items.title: TextPressure
items.description: Characters scale / warp interactively based on pointer pressure zone.

items.name: TextType
items.title: TextType
items.description: Typewriter effect with blinking cursor and adjustable typing cadence.

items.name: TrueFocus
items.title: TrueFocus
items.description: Applies dynamic blur / clarity based over a series of words in order.

items.name: VariableProximity
items.title: VariableProximity
items.description: Letter styling changes continuously with pointer distance mapping.

items.name: AnimatedList
items.title: AnimatedList
items.description: List items enter with staggered motion variants for polished reveals.

items.name: BounceCards
items.title: BounceCards
items.description: Cards bounce that bounce in on mount.

items.name: BubbleMenu
items.title: BubbleMenu
items.description: Floating circular expanding menu with staggered item reveal.

items.name: CardNav
items.title: CardNav
items.description: Expandable navigation bar with card panels revealing nested links.

items.name: CardSwap
items.title: CardSwap
items.description: Cards animate position swapping with smooth layout transitions.

items.name: Carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: Responsive carousel with touch gestures, looping and transitions.

items.name: ChromaGrid
items.title: ChromaGrid
items.description: A responsive grid of grayscale tiles. Hovering the grid reaveals their colors.

items.name: CircularGallery
items.title: CircularGallery
items.description: Circular orbit gallery rotating images.

items.name: Counter
items.title: Counter
items.description: Flexible animated counter supporting increments + easing.

items.name: DecayCard
items.title: DecayCard
items.description: Hover parallax effect that disintegrates the content of a card.

items.name: Dock
items.title: Dock
items.description: macOS style magnifying dock with proximity scaling of icons.

items.name: DomeGallery
items.title: DomeGallery
items.description: Immersive 3D dome gallery projecting images on a hemispheric surface.

items.name: ElasticSlider
items.title: ElasticSlider
items.description: Slider handle stretches elastically then snaps with spring physics.

items.name: FlowingMenu
items.title: FlowingMenu
items.description: Liquid flowing active indicator glides between menu items.

items.name: FlyingPosters
items.title: FlyingPosters
items.description: 3D posters rotate on scroll infinitely.

items.name: Folder
items.title: Folder
items.description: Interactive folder opens to reveal nested content smooth motion.

items.name: GlassIcons
items.title: GlassIcons
items.description: Icon set styled with frosted glass blur.

items.name: GlassSurface
items.title: GlassSurface
items.description: Advanced Apple-style glass surface with real-time distortion + lighting.

items.name: GooeyNav
items.title: GooeyNav
items.description: Navigation indicator morphs with gooey blob transitions between items.

items.name: InfiniteMenu
items.title: InfiniteMenu
items.description: Horizontally looping menu effect that scrolls endlessly with seamless wrap.

items.name: InfiniteScroll
items.title: InfiniteScroll
items.description: Infinite scrolling container auto-loads content near viewport end.

items.name: MagicBento
items.title: MagicBento
items.description: Interactive bento grid tiles expand + animate with various options.

items.name: Masonry
items.title: Masonry
items.description: Responsive masonry layout with animated reflow + gaps optimization.

items.name: PillNav
items.title: PillNav
items.description: Minimal pill nav with sliding active highlight + smooth easing.

items.name: PixelCard
items.title: PixelCard
items.description: Card content revealed through pixel expansion transition.

items.name: ProfileCard
items.title: ProfileCard
items.description: Animated profile card glare with 3D hover effect.

items.name: ScrollStack
items.title: ScrollStack
items.description: Overlapping card stack reveals on scroll with depth layering.

items.name: SpotlightCard
items.title: SpotlightCard
items.description: Dynamic spotlight follows cursor casting gradient illumination.

items.name: Stack
items.title: Stack
items.description: Layered stack with swipe animations and smooth transitions.

items.name: Stepper
items.title: Stepper
items.description: Animated multi-step progress indicator with active state transitions.

items.name: TiltedCard
items.title: TiltedCard
items.description: 3D perspective tilt card reacting to pointer.

items.name: StaggeredMenu
items.title: StaggeredMenu
items.description: Menu with staggered item animations and smooth transitions on open/close.

items.name: Aurora
items.title: Aurora
items.description: Flowing aurora gradient background.

items.name: Balatro
items.title: Balatro
items.description: The balatro shader, fully customizalbe and interactive.

items.name: Ballpit
items.title: Ballpit
items.description: Physics ball pit simulation with bouncing colorful spheres.

items.name: Beams
items.title: Beams
items.description: Crossing animated ribbons with customizable properties.

items.name: ColorBends
items.title: ColorBends
items.description: Vibrant color bends with smooth flowing animation.

items.name: DarkVeil
items.title: DarkVeil
items.description: Subtle dark background with a smooth animation and postprocessing.

items.name: Dither
items.title: Dither
items.description: Retro dithered noise shader background.

items.name: DotGrid
items.title: DotGrid
items.description: Animated dot grid with cursor interactions.

items.name: FaultyTerminal
items.title: FaultyTerminal
items.description: Terminal CRT scanline squares effect with flicker + noise.

items.name: FloatingLines
items.title: FloatingLines
items.description: 3D floating lines that react to cursor movement.

items.name: Galaxy
items.title: Galaxy
items.description: Parallax realistic starfield with pointer interactions.

items.name: GradientBlinds
items.title: GradientBlinds
items.description: Layered gradient blinds with spotlight and noise distortion.

items.name: GridDistortion
items.title: GridDistortion
items.description: Warped grid mesh distorts smoothly reacting to cursor.

items.name: GridMotion
items.title: GridMotion
items.description: Perspective moving grid lines based on cusror position.

items.name: Hyperspeed
items.title: Hyperspeed
items.description: Animated lines continously moving to simulate hyperspace travel on click hold.

items.name: Iridescence
items.title: Iridescence
items.description: Slick iridescent shader with shifting waves.

items.name: LetterGlitch
items.title: LetterGlitch
items.description: Matrix style letter animation.

items.name: LightRays
items.title: LightRays
items.description: Volumetric light rays/beams with customizable direction.

items.name: Lightning
items.title: Lightning
items.description: Procedural lightning bolts with branching and glow flicker.

items.name: LiquidChrome
items.title: LiquidChrome
items.description: Liquid metallic chrome shader with flowing reflective surface.

items.name: Orb
items.title: Orb
items.description: Floating energy orb with customizable hover effect.

items.name: Particles
items.title: Particles
items.description: Configurable particle system.

items.name: PixelBlast
items.title: PixelBlast
items.description: Exploding pixel particle bursts with optional liquid postprocessing.

items.name: Plasma
items.title: Plasma
items.description: Organic plasma gradients swirl + morph with smooth turbulence.

items.name: Prism
items.title: Prism
items.description: Rotating prism with configurable intensity, size, and colors.

items.name: PrismaticBurst
items.title: PrismaticBurst
items.description: Burst of light rays with controllable color, distortion, amount.

items.name: RippleGrid
items.title: RippleGrid
items.description: A grid that continously animates with a ripple effect.

items.name: Silk
items.title: Silk
items.description: Smooth waves background with soft lighting.

items.name: Squares
items.title: Squares
items.description: Animated squares with scaling + direction customization.

items.name: Threads
items.title: Threads
items.description: Animated pattern of lines forming a fabric-like motion.

items.name: Waves
items.title: Waves
items.description: Layered lines that form smooth wave patterns with animation.

items.name: LiquidEther
items.title: LiquidEther
items.description: Interactive liquid shader with flowing distortion and customizable colors.

items.name: LightPillar
items.title: LightPillar
items.description: Vertical pillar of light with glow effects.
